info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 13 at 9:11AM MDT by NWS Missoula
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Deer Lodge, southeastern Granite, north central Silver Bow and south central Powell Counties through 1000 AM MDT... At 911 AM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over West Valley, or near Anaconda, moving northeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...Half-inch size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Deer Lodge, Anaconda, West Valley, Warm Springs, Galen, Lost Creek and Racetrack. This includes Interstate 90 between mile markers 185 and 204. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH
info.instruction: This storm may intensify, so be certain to monitor local radio stations and available television stations for additional information and possible warnings from the National Weather Service.
